answers.answer: Before trying anything, you can ask your OB for alternatives. She'll know what's best for you and your baby. :)

question: Hi I'm Temeka..I am labeled high risk due to diabetes.. I am trying my hardest not to gain weight with out starving my self. But it seems like I look at food and gain pounds.Is it safe to eat Nutrasystem meals while pregnant ... I'm curious because I want to feed my growing baby but I don't want my weight to hurt him..
title: I am high risk....
